name: Steel Structures
short_description: At Solid Steel Buildings, our Pre-Engineered Steel Buildings and Metal Buildings are made exclusively of high strength, American made Steel, meaning that Solid Steel Building will provide you with a high quality, solidly designed, pre-engineered steel and metal building system.  Made in America, by Americans, a Solid Steel Building System is the standard by which other companies are measured. Our steel framed buildings are engineered to meet any local building code requirements so permit approval is a breeze.  Solid Steel Buildings also provides steel building and metal building erection under the same roof, so you can expect your steel building project to be completed right the first time, on budget. We provide quality metal buildings as a standard, not an option.
